iteration_goal: Enhance test coverage for all 6 bar generator types from 27-50% to 70%+
deliverables:
- Tests for dollar value accumulation
- Tests for volume tracking per bar
- Edge cases (zero volume, high prices)
- Performance benchmark test
- bar_indices mapping verification
acceptance_criteria:
- Coverage for dollar_bars.py reaches 70%+
- All accumulation scenarios tested
- Performance target met (1M+ rows/sec)
- Edge cases handled gracefully
